content.question: The quotation marks around the phrase “international community” serve primarily to

choices.label: indicate that the author is quoting an established source rather than making a subjective claim
signal a skeptical tone that reflects the author’s doubts about the existence of such a community
emphasize the need for global cooperation when effective intervention is required
protect the author from allegations that he is claiming credit for a phrase coined by others

content.answer: signal a skeptical tone that reflects the author’s doubts about the existence of such a community

skill.text: Skill 7.C: Explain how grammar and mechanics contribute to the clarity and effectiveness of an argument.
